description: The Sea Buckthorn is an amazing shrub. It is native to the cold, coastal regions of much of Europe, Asia and North America. This hardy species can survive temperatures of -35Â°C and is known to thrive in difficult terrain, such as sandy beaches, sea cliffs and mountain slopes. The bushes are full of orange berries, rich in Vitamin C, flavonoids and Omega-7. As a herbal medicine they support healthy skin, nails, hair and immune system. Not only this, but Sea Buckthorn berries are a powerful antioxidant and have medicinal benefits for digestive health. Finally, the dense foliage provides shelter for animals, birds and insect species. Sea Buckthorn really is an amazing plant!
